about_the_game:
The Tower on the Borderland is an atmospheric survival-horror game, set in a gargantuan labyrinth.

In this demo, you play as Erin, a special ops soldier who finds herself trapped in an otherworldly domain. She has just been dropped off in a part of the Tower, without weapons or armor. Find your way through the area, collect equipment upgrades, and challenge one of the demon soldiers that is hunting you.

This demo does not save your progress upon exiting the game. Save progress will not carry over into the final game, since the structure and gameplay of the final game will be different from this demo.

content_descriptors.notes: It's a horror game with violence against monsters and human enemies.
